## Calculating the betas for specified R0

```{r}
source("R/network_fxns.R")

er_dist <- get_er_deg_dist(mean_deg = 10, n = 10000)

gamma_vax <- 1 / 5

desired_r0 <- 1

getBeta(r_not = desired_r0, deg_dist = er_dist, gamma = gamma_vax)


```
